• button
  • list

Style Guide

This is the styleguide

button

{{component 'button' options}}
options: {
  title:  "" [Hello World],
  url:    "" [#],
  color:  "standard|blue|green|red|outline-standard|outline-blue|outline-green|outline-red" [standard],
  size:   "small|medium|large|x-large" [medium]
}

colors

standard

Hello World 
{{component 'button' color="standard"}}
<a href="#" class="btn btn--medium btn--standard">Hello World</a>

blue

Hello World 
{{component 'button' color="blue"}}
<a href="#" class="btn btn--medium btn--blue">Hello World</a>

green

Hello World 
{{component 'button' color="green"}}
<a href="#" class="btn btn--medium btn--green">Hello World</a>

red

Hello World 
{{component 'button' color="red"}}
<a href="#" class="btn btn--medium btn--red">Hello World</a>

outline-standard

Hello World 
{{component 'button' color="outline-standard"}}
<a href="#" class="btn btn--medium btn--outline-standard">Hello World</a>

outline-blue

Hello World 
{{component 'button' color="outline-blue"}}
<a href="#" class="btn btn--medium btn--outline-blue">Hello World</a>

outline-green

Hello World 
{{component 'button' color="outline-green"}}
<a href="#" class="btn btn--medium btn--outline-green">Hello World</a>

outline-red

Hello World 
{{component 'button' color="outline-red"}}
<a href="#" class="btn btn--medium btn--outline-red">Hello World</a>

sizes

small

Hello World 
{{component 'button' size="small"}}
<a href="#" class="btn btn--small btn--standard">Hello World</a>

medium

Hello World 
{{component 'button' size="medium"}}
<a href="#" class="btn btn--medium btn--standard">Hello World</a>

large

Hello World 
{{component 'button' size="large"}}
<a href="#" class="btn btn--large btn--standard">Hello World</a>

x-large

Hello World 
{{component 'button' size="x-large"}}
<a href="#" class="btn btn--x-large btn--standard">Hello World</a>

list

{{component 'list' options}}
options: {
  style:  "" [standard],
}
